snippet: Commissioner Adam Silver barely waited until Anderson Cooper had signed off when he issued an apology for the owner his predecessor should have run out of the NBA years ago....

headline.print_headline: Column: Sterling Erases All Doubt in Latest Rant
headline.main: Column: Sterling Erases All Doubt in Latest Rant

lead_paragraph: Commissioner Adam Silver barely waited until Anderson Cooper had signed off when he issued an apology for the owner his predecessor should have run out of the NBA years ago.
